content:
Cole Miller follows through with his swing off the tee on the tenth hole during the Rutherford Intercollegiate on Sunday April   at the Penn State Golf Course PERIOD Penn State won the invitational over eleven other teams PERIOD

Penn States Cole Miller may not have finished the way he would have liked at the British Amateur earlier this week but his week just got a whole lot better PERIOD

On Thursday the Golf Coaches Association of America GCAA announced its  Division I PING AllAmerica teams and the Nittany Lion rising senior was named to the honorable mention team PERIOD

Miller had a strong spring season for Penn State which saw the Pennsylvania native pick up five individual wins three fullfield including the NCAA Washington Regional PERIOD

The Nittany Lions finished fifth at the regional good enough to advance to their first NCAA Championship since  PERIOD

The win in Washington also earned Miller an invite to the The Amateur Championship in England this week PERIOD Miller finished 1overpar tied for ninetieth in the field of  for the tournament and missed the cut for match play by two strokes PERIOD

In addition to the AllAmerica honors Miller also garnered a secondteam AllBig Ten Selection and was Penn States winner of the Big Ten Sportsmanship award PERIOD

Assistant coach Mark Leon was quick to twitter to congratulate Miller and called it a  for the program PERIOD

Huge day for our programCole Miller named to All American Team PERIOD Our captain and leader PERIOD The kid is the quintessential Penn Stater PERIOD WEARE

Miller is the first Penn State AllAmerica selection since TJ Howe and Kevin Foley in  coincidentally the same year as the Nittany Lions last NCAA Championship appearance PERIOD Both Howe and Foley are now playing professionally PERIOD

The full list of GCAA AllAmerica selections can be found here PERIOD
